PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs based on these polymers : PC71BM blend layers showed good photovoltaic performance with a maximum PCE as high as 9.70% .

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM |
| PCE |

Note: I'm assuming that "PSCs" and "polymers" are abbreviations for "Perovskite Solar Cells" and "polymers" respectively, and they are not "Property Name" entities. Also, I'm assuming that "9.70%" is a value assigned to "PCE" and not a "Property Name" entity itself.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that there is only one clear "Material Property" entity in the paragraph. Here are the valid entities as a Markdown table:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

Note: I'm assuming that "PCE" is an abbreviation for "Power Conversion Efficiency," which is a material property in the context of photovoltaic performance. I have removed "PC71BM" from the list because it is not clear from the paragraph whether it is a material property or a material name.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs based on these polymers : PC71BM blend layers showed good photovoltaic performance with a maximum PCE as high as 9.70% .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PC71BM |
| 9.70% |

These are the identified "Property Value" entities from the given paragraph. The first entity, "PC71BM", is a type of polymer used in the creation of Polymer Solar Cells (PSCs). The second entity, "9.70%", represents the maximum Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) achieved by the PSCs based on these polymers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 9.70% |

After reevaluating the paragraph, I found that only the "9.70%" entity clearly refers to the value of a material property, which is the maximum Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) achieved by the PSCs based on these polymers. The "PC71BM" entity is a type of polymer, but it does not represent a specific value of a material property.
